headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS STABIL-ION CONTROLLER
description: Stabil-Ion Controller with two setpoint process control 370108
specstable:
Manufacturer Granville Phil
Model 370
Description Stabil-Ion Controller
Gauge Types Controlled Ion only
Cables Included No
Other Information

Catalog No.: 370102
Power requirements: 90V to 130V or 180V to 240V

Two ion gauge sequential operation
Two channel setpoint process control 370108
Cables and gauges not included(inquire about availability)
Click here for the data sheet
Click here for the manual


This controller can be calibrated for different ion gauges, calibration for each channel is loaded via memory modules.
If you have Stabil-Ion gauge with individual module containing calibration for that gauge, you should upload that to the controller before using it.
If you have standard Bayard-Alpert glass gauge, you need to upload average calibration for that type of the gauge with sensitivity 10/Torr to channel one, two or both.
Memory modules for uploading can be purchased from MKS Instruments.

Power Requirements 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 11.000 in (27.9 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 16 lb (7 kg)
